TextBlock.Text: SENNETTI: Update: I have translated the Dree name for the area we find ourselves in. Apparently, the Dree refer to everywhere enclosed by this plant as the <color=purple>Deep Bramble</color>.
AZOLLA: Keep up the good work, Sennetti. We all appreciate your efforts, both towards deciphering the Dree language and keeping us updated.
NESIA: Interesting. Do you suppose the existence of a "Deep" Bramble implies the existence of a "Shallow" Bramble?
OKALIS: Perhaps the Shallow Bramble is where the <color=orange>Vessel</color> was stranded?
